org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure
Class FileTransferFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure.FileTransferFactory

public abstract class FileTransferFactory
extends java.lang.Object

The FileTransferFactory handles all the FileTransfers. It has a Stack of FileTransfer objects which are currently not in use and a Vector of FileTransfer objects which are currently in use transferring files. The GridContainer calls getFileTransfer() to get an unused FileTransfer, either one from the Stack or a new instance is created if the Stack is empty. The GridContainer then calls the transferFile() method of FileTransfer to copy the file.

When each file transfer starts or ends, it notifies every other file transfer using notifyAllFileTransferStarted() or notifyAllFileTransferEnded() so they can recalculate their estimated transfer times.

Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

Since:
JDK1.4

Constructor Detail

FileTransferFactory

public FileTransferFactory()
Method Detail

getFileTransfer

protected static FileTransfer getFileTransfer()
Called by the GridContainer when it wants a FileTransfer to copy or replicate a file. It returns a FileTransfer object (either from the Stack of spare ones or by creating a new one) so the GridContainer can call its transferFile() method.

Returns:
A FileTransfer object the GridContainer can use to transfer a file.

notifyAllFileTransferStarted

protected static void notifyAllFileTransferStarted(FileTransfer ft)
Notifies all currently running FileTransfers that a FileTransfer has started, so they can adjust their estimated file transfer time based on the new network situation.

Parameters:
ft - The FileTransfer calling this method.

notifyAllFileTransferEnded

protected static void notifyAllFileTransferEnded(FileTransfer ft)
Notifies all currently running FileTransfers that a FileTransfer has ended, so they can adjust their estimated file transfer time based on the new network situation. The FileTransfer ft is taken off the running file transfers Vector and put on the spare file transfers Stack.

Parameters:
ft - The FileTransfer calling this method.
